name: untitled dating sim (first three dates)
description:
Rather than an exchange between player and game
aestheticized by violence, players use the
logic of visual novels to create the possibility
for love/connection.

Untitled Dating Sim (first three dates) includes three (3)
different iterations of Nilson to date, each with three (3)
dates for a total of nine (9) unique scenes. I dunno,
it's probably over like an hour of content.

This game is best played in bed with your friends,
preferably projected on a wall and with xbox controller.

For free download keys, message me with a poem,
drawing, hex, recipe, joke, or anecdote at
nilsonthomascarroll at gmail.com < 33

Made with RPG Maker MV.

Try the demo in your browser, buddy.

Originally presented at Visual Studies Workshop
in Rochester NY (December 2017) as installation
and performance.
